snippet: Mr. De Keyser created abstractions with a striking economy of means, exhibited primarily in Belgium and the Netherlands until receiving international recognition in 1992.
abstract: Raoul De Keyser, Belgian painter of evocative, seemingly awkward abstractions, dies at age 82.
lead_paragraph: Mr. De Keyser created abstractions with a striking economy of means, exhibited primarily in Belgium and the Netherlands until receiving international recognition in 1992.

headline.seo: Raoul De Keyser, Belgian Abstract Painter, Dies at 82
headline.main: Raoul De Keyser, Intuitive Abstract Painter, Dies at 82
headline.print_headline: Raoul De Keyser, Intuitive Abstract Painter, Dies at 82
